name: Can You Rewind?
description:
Can You Rewind is a simple 2.5 D platformer with a twist.

The game was made for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2.
The theme was 'REWIND'.

Hope you enjoy the game :)

CONTROLS

KEYACTIONArrows Left and Right / A and DRun
SPACE / UPJump
